name: Jacquelyn Marcella
description: Born and raised in Fort Worth, Texas, Jacquelyn escaped the south as soon as she could. Jacquelyn is a proud mom to over 50 houseplants (and counting). Her career journey has included being a toilet-paper-ordering intern to a digital resource lead for team of 150 people. Currently, she's in the Web Development Immersive program at General Assembly.
imgCaption: A triangle of hair at the computer, c. 1996
